SELECT A.MED_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , COUNT(B.ALARM_ID) AS TOTAL_DAY_TODO FROM med_info A JOIN schedule B ON A.MED_ID = B.MED_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = 'q001' AND A.MED_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ( (A.START_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(#{mthStartDate}, '%Y-%m-01') AND A.START_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(#{mthStartDate}) + INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-01')) OR (A.END_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(#{mthStartDate}, '%Y-%m-01') AND A.END_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(#{mthStartDate}) + INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-01')) )
GROUP BY A.MED_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE

SELECT A.MED_ID , B.SCHE_DATE , COUNT(A.MED_ID) AS COMPLETED_DAY_TODO FROM med_info A JOIN sche_log B ON A.MED_ID = B.MED_ID AND B.SCHE_CHK = 'Y' AND B.LOG_STATUS != 'N' WHERE A.USER_ID = 'q001' AND A.MED_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ( (A.START_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(#{mthStartDate}, '%Y-%m-01') AND A.START_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(#{mthStartDate}) + INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-01')) OR (A.END_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(#{mthStartDate}, '%Y-%m-01') AND A.END_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(#{mthStartDate}) + INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-01')) )
GROUP BY A.MED_ID , B.SCHE_DATE
SELECT A.MED_ID , A.ALARM_ID FROM schedule A JOIN alarm_set B ON A.ALARM_ID = B.ALARM_ID WHERE( A.MED_ID , B.ALARM_TYPE ) IN( (#{medId}, #{alarmType}) )
